users.name: The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho
users.description: A young shepherd named Santiago travels in search of treasure, only to discover that real treasure lies within. This inspiring novel teaches about following your dreams, fate.

users.name: Crown of Stars Book by Kate Elliott
users.description: Crown of Stars takes place in Novaria, a Westeros-esque alternative Europe in which tension persists from a long-ago rift between elf-like creatures and humans.

users.name: The Black Magician Trilogy by Trudi Canavan
users.description: The Black Magician trilogy tells the story of Sonea, a girl from the slums of the magical country Kyralia. Though normally only upper class-citizens have the capacity for magic.
